attributes.action: Make Farage ensure the pledge of £350m of EU cash to NHS is upheld.
attributes.additional_details:
"Vote Leave emblazoned the £350 million claim onto the side of a tour bus and drove it around the country." - The Independent
“No I can’t [guarantee it], and I would never have made that claim. That was one of the mistakes that I think the Leave campaign made." Nigel Farage, ITV Good Morning Britain
attributes.background: Before the referendum, the Leave campaign pledged that they would give the £350 million spent on the EU back to the NHS. Yesterday, Nigel Farage denied this by saying he "could not [guarantee it]" on live television. The public did not vote for Farage's lies. Stand up for the NHS and democracy.
